subject: Colleges and Universities
Football (College)
Child Abuse and Neglect
Sex Crimes
lead_paragraph: Graham B. Spanier, who was fired as president of Penn State, said in a magazine interview that he had no reason to suspect Jerry Sandusky of sexually abusing children.
snippet: Graham B. Spanier, who was fired as president of Penn State, said in a magazine interview that he had no reason to suspect Jerry Sandusky of sexually abusing children.
